src:
Liga 1: Jadwal Persib Bandung Usai Kalahkan Kalteng Putra
01 Nov 2019, 13:33 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Persib Bandung berhasil menjaga tren positif dalam lanjutan Liga 1 Indonesia. Menghadapi Kalteng Putra di laga pekan ke-26, Persib menang 2-0 saat bermain di Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Dua gol tim Maung Bandung datang dari Kevin va Kippersluis pada menit 45+4. Lalu gol penutup dicetak oleh Ezechiel N'Douassel pada menit ke-61.
Tambahan tiga angka membuat posisi Persib naik di klasemen Liga 1 Indonesia. Pasukan Robert Alberts berada di peringkat 8 dengan 34 poin. Sementara Kalteng Putra menempati posisi ke-17 mengemas 23 poin.
Selanjutnya, Persib akan menghadapi PSIS Semarang. Setelah di dua laga kandang sebelumnya mereka tampil di luar kota, kali ini Persib bisa bermain di Bandung saat menjamu PSIS Semarang pada 6 November 2019 atau pekan ke-27 Liga 1.

Hasil Persib Bandung di Liga 1 Indonesia 2019

10 Mei: Persib 3-0 Pesipura Jayapura9 Mei: Semen Padang 0-0 Persib
18 Juni: Persib 1-1 Tira Persikabo23 Juni: Persib 1-1 Madura United30 Juni: Persib 12 Bhayangkara FC
5 Juli: Persebaya 4-0 Persib10 Juli: Persija 1-1 Persib16 Juli: Persib 2-0 Kalteng Putra21 Juli: PSIS Semarang 0-1 Persib28 Juli: Persib 0-2 Bali United.30 Juli: Arema FC 5-1 Persib
3 Agustus: Barito Putera 1-0 Persib9 Agustus: Persela Lamongan 2-2 Persib14 Agustus: Persib 2-2 Borneo FC19 Agustus: PSM Makassar 3-1 Persib25 Agustus: Badak Lampung 1-1 Persib31 Agustus: Persib 1-0 PSS Sleman
14 September: Tira Persikabo 1-1 Persib18 September: Persib 1-1 Semen Padang23 September: Persipura 1-3 Persib 28 September: Persib vs Arema FC (ditunda)
5 Oktober: Madura United 2-1 Persib18 Oktober: Persib 4-1 Persebaya23 Oktober: Bhayangkara FC 0-0 Persib28 Oktober: Persib 2-0 Persija.
1 November: Kalteng Putra 0-2 Persib

Jadwal Persib Bandung berikutnya

6 November: Persib vs PSIS Semarang24 November: Persib vs Barito Putera28 November: Bali United vs Persib

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
League 1: Persib Bandung Schedule After Defeating Central Kalimantan Men
01 Nov 2019, 13:33 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Persib Bandung has managed to maintain a positive trend in the continuation of League 1 Indonesia. Facing Kalteng Putra in the 26th match, Persib won 2-0 while playing at the Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Friday, November 1, 2019.
Two of the Maung Bandung team's goals came from Kevin va Kippersluis on 45 + 4 minutes. Then the closing goal was scored by Ezechiel N'Douassel in the 61st minute.
An additional three points make Persib's position up in the Indonesian League 1 standings. Robert Alberts's army is ranked 8th with 34 points. While Kalteng Putra occupies the 17th position to pack 23 points.
Furthermore, Persib will face PSIS Semarang. After the two previous home games they performed outside the city, this time Persib can play in Bandung while entertaining PSIS Semarang on November 6, 2019 or Week 27 of League 1.

Results of Persib Bandung in League 1 Indonesia 2019

10 May: Persib 3-0 Pesipura Jayapura 9 May: Semen Padang 0-0 Persib
June 18: Persib 1-1 Tira Persikabo23 June: Persib 1-1 Madura United30 June: Persib 12 Bhayangkara FC
July 5: Persebaya 4-0 Persib10 July: Persija 1-1 Persib16 July: Persib 2-0 Kalteng Putra21 July: PSIS Semarang 0-1 Persib28 July: Persib 0-2 Bali United.30 July: Arema FC 5-1 Persib
3 August: Barito Putera 1-0 Persib 9 August: Persela Lamongan 2-2 Persib 14 August: Persib 2-2 Borneo FC19 August: PSM Makassar 3-1 Persib25 August: Rhinoceros Lampung 1-1 Persib31 August: Persib 1-0 PSS Sleman
14 September: Tira Persikabo 1-1 Persib18 September: Persib 1-1 Semen Padang September 23: Persipura 1-3 Persib 28 September: Persib vs Arema FC (postponed)
5 October: Madura United 2-1 Persib18 October: Persib 4-1 Persebaya23 October: Bhayangkara FC 0-0 Persib28 October: Persib 2-0 Persija.
1 November: Central Kalimantan Putra 0-2 Persib

The next Persib Bandung schedule

INDONESIA LIGA
